content: I worked for years to pull myself out of debt after my divorce. I know the pain and humiliation. My ex sounds a lot like yours. I am still paying, despite having all of the debt paid off because it’s taking forever for my credit score to come up. I’m trying to purchase a home for myself, but despite having no credit card debt, and no collections, I can’t seem to get approved for a mortgage. I will never trust a man enough to surrender my finances or career ever again. I don’t mean to sound bitter, but this rebuilding has been far too painful and costly for me.
